channel.title: Ultraviolet Grasslands: Blues for the Red Sun
channel.description:
Walked hundred miles of desert sun, to grasp the chance that I'll be gone … Kyuss, Freedom Run ![Ek9N_rvW0AMIidF|690x478](upload://r91kFgpFyO1P8TEjMJPdyCd5RRw.jpeg) Ultraviolet Grasslands is a psychedelic metal setting by Luka Rejec about exploration, survival, drugs and resource management. This is a continuation of the adventures of the Cogflower Caravan on her journey to the Black City. New and returning players are equally welcome. We will be using Whitehack, a rules lite version of the world's most popular RPG. This event is scheduled to run for 3 hours. It will be recorded via Streamyard and put on YouTube assuming all parties agree. There will be 3 sessions in February. Being able to attend each session is ideal but not required. You must RSVP to each session you wish to attend. This game will follow the Gauntlet Community Code of Conduct: https://www.gauntlet-rpg.com/community-code-of-conduct.html. We will be using [the X-Card](https://docs.google.com/document/d/1SB0jsx34bWHZWbnNIVVuMjhDkrdFGo1_hSC2BWPlI3A/edit) and other safety tools players suggest.
[date=2021-02-06 time=18:00:00 format="LLLL" timezone="Europe/Amsterdam"] → [date=2021-02-06 time=21:00:00 format="LLLL" timezone="Europe/Amsterdam"] https://gauntletcalendar.com/event-detail/-MRGcHFGZylFxpP_P2oc [date=2021-02-13 time=18:00:00 format="LLLL" timezone="Europe/Amsterdam"] → [date=2021-02-13 time=21:00:00 format="LLLL" timezone="Europe/Amsterdam"]https://gauntletcalendar.com/event-detail/-MRGcl5F0483JprbrAZQ [date=2021-02-20 time=18:00:00 format="LLLL" timezone="Europe/Amsterdam"] → [date=2021-02-20 time=21:00:00 format="LLLL" timezone="Europe/Amsterdam"] https://gauntletcalendar.com/event-detail/-MRGd9lkmv2oJ_07G66l

item.title: Ultraviolet Grasslands: Blues for the Red Sun
item.dc:creator: @HorstWurst
item.description:
@HorstWurst wrote:

Walked hundred miles of desert sun,
to grasp the chance that I’ll be gone …
Kyuss, Freedom Run

Ek9N_rvW0AMIidF970×673 265 KB

Ultraviolet Grasslands is a psychedelic metal setting by Luka Rejec about exploration, survival, drugs and resource management.
This is a continuation of the adventures of the Cogflower Caravan on her journey to the Black City. New and returning players are equally welcome.
We will be using Whitehack, a rules lite version of the world’s most popular RPG.
This event is scheduled to run for 3 hours. It will be recorded via Streamyard and put on YouTube assuming all parties agree.
There will be 3 sessions in February. Being able to attend each session is ideal but not required. You must RSVP to each session you wish to attend.
This game will follow the Gauntlet Community Code of Conduct: https://www.gauntlet-rpg.com/community-code-of-conduct.html. We will be using the X-Card and other safety tools players suggest.

Saturday, February 6, 2021 5:00 PM → Saturday, February 6, 2021 8:00 PM https://gauntletcalendar.com/event-detail/-MRGcHFGZylFxpP_P2oc
Saturday, February 13, 2021 5:00 PM → Saturday, February 13, 2021 8:00 PMhttps://gauntletcalendar.com/event-detail/-MRGcl5F0483JprbrAZQ
